comments.message: I'll buy it if it comes in venti size
I understand that the cup can be use at least 30 times.But can it be used after that?

The promo is misleading. It says that you can purchase it with ANY machiatto drink. But the barristas at Tampines Central said that you need to purchase at least grande sized. If not you don't qualify to purchase.
I'm with Shawna, why can it only be used 30 times?
Hi, I live in Jakarta, Indonesia and we don't have the Starbucks reusable cups here. Anyone opening an open pre order for the Starbucks reusable cups? Please let me know :)

Obviously I look like I need one of these badly when I am already buying something with my own tumbler. Please, tell your baristas to stop selling this thing and just concentrate on delivery what they have been good at - coffee! :)

Why aren't guys aren't selling these on their own or with any drink? What's the point in offering a cup that's environmentally friendly and saying you can get it with only ONE drink? That defeats the purpose of offering the cup as something that helps cuts wastage. 

What if I want to save the earth with a simple cup of brewed coffee? or a hot chocolate?
Got mine but you need to buy a cup of coffee in order to get one for $3.90 and if you bring it the nxt time to have your cup of coffee you will get 50 cents off
In 2013, I got the cup in UK for £1. I've been using it for mainly cold drinks since then. Should not be a problem using it more than 30 times.

8.post_text:
Make it a Saturdate this Valentine's at Starbucks Fullerton Waterboat House as we celebrate the first anniversary of our 100th store. 

Take home sweet memories at our photo booth from noon and also be treated to a Valentine's Day tumbler set that includes 2 exclusive tumblers (pictured), 2 complimentary tall-sized drinks and a slice of cake at $55.

Tumbler set sold only at Fullerton Waterboat House on 14 Feb, while stocks last.
